```{r}
source('./R/synthetic_data.R')
```

```{r}
set.seed(456)
time <- 1:100
trend <- 0.05 * time
noise <- rnorm(100, mean = 0, sd = .2)
non_stationary_data <- trend + noise

# Plot non-stationary data
plot(lag(non_stationary_data, 40), type = "l", main = "Non-Stationary Data with Trend")
```

```{r}
# set.seed(456)
n <- 500
ts <-prot1(n, 3, 60)
noise <- rnorm(n, mean = 0, sd = .2)
plot(ts$time, ts$values+noise, type='l')
```
